## abbyyR: Access Abbyy Cloud OCR SDK via R

### Load the package

```r
library(abbyyR)

"
Get the latest version from github:

# install.packages('devtools')
devtools::install_github('soodoku/abbyyR')
"
```

```
## [1] "\nGet the latest version from github:\n\n# install.packages('devtools')\ndevtools::install_github('soodoku/abbyyR')\n"
```

### Set credentials


```r
setapp(c("factbook", "7YVBc8E6xMricoTwp0mF0aHP"))
```
